name: inplay
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sports_betting_api.
Tool description: Get up and running in less than 5 minutes with our comprehensive developer documentation. Get Start - https://bet365soft.com/docs
API description: Fetches the in-play sports betting data from the RapidAPI service.

lang.description: The language code for the response data.

sp.description: The sport identifier for which to fetch in-play data.
